name: Nature Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
This jigsaw puzzle app has 140 photos of breathtaking landscapes: mountains, glaciers, sunsets, caves, deserts and jungles. The game works offline: all photos come during installation, so the app doesn't have to download them later. You can use the app when you don't have an Internet connection or when it's too expensive, like, in an airport abroad.

You can play it at various levels of difficulty, from 3x3 pieces to 20x20. If you close the app and come back to it later, the state of the puzzle is automatically saved. 

With 4 immersive soundtracks, the app is very relaxing. At the same time, jigsaw puzzles are great in any age to keep your brain sharp and improve spatial cognition.

All our games are completely free, have nothing locked, and don't ask for in-app purchases.
